question: Some people believe that their children should do educational activities during their free time. Others say that in this way children are under pressure. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: In the current scenario parents are more attentive about the academic performance of children due to the growing rate of school level competition. Some individual states that students should engage in educational activities during their spare second.While, others argue that it is not at all a right manner and would create stress among children. This essay discussed these views in some detail before and states the personal opinion.

On the one hand, better education, which is considered as a prime factor to develop a successful future. For instance, if students had worked hard,they would have achieved the goal for maintaining a better carrier. The present generations are living in a competitive global,if adults dedicate extra hours for studies the way for social, emotional and academic success would come into practicable. Furthermore, it not only generate a fruitful future, but also inspire a lifelong love of learning and help them to become independent.

On the other hand, leisure stage, which is denoted as an occasion for young people to engage in recreational activities and make their mind freely. To illustrate an example, had teenagers engaged entertains, themselves during free hours,they would have overcome academic stress and make their mind freely. Longer academic hours without any leisure could result in fatigue among children, although make them mentally exhausted and would attain weak scores in academic test, spare moment aids youths to overcome such problems. Therefore, both education and free time play a significant role in the well success of children's betterment.

After thorough analysis on this subject, it is predicted that education is one of the key factors for a child's achievement. However, dedication to academic performance without any free of time would leads harmful effects in their life. The more children become relaxed, the better their future would be.
